TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ParserError extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示分析器错误或警告。

span.span: Represents a parser error or warning.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对象表示在引发异常时创建的错误 。A object represents an error that is created when an exception is thrown. 分析器错误对象可以包含错误消息文本、发生错误的文件的虚拟路径，以及该文件中的错误的后续行号。A parser error object can contain error message text, a virtual path to the file where the error occurred, and the subsequent line number of the error in that file. 如果发生多个分析器错误或要将多个分析器错误存储在一个集中的位置，请使用 对象。If more than one parser error occurs or you want to store multiple parser errors in a centralized location, use the object. 分析器错误的类型为 。A parser error is of the type . 有关异常以及如何处理它们的详细信息，请参阅 [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118)。For more information on exceptions and how to handle them, go to [MSDN Library](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37118). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何向对象添加新的分析器错误 。The following code example demonstrates how to add a new parser error to a object. [!code-csharp[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/CS/ParserErrorCollection_CS.aspx#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.ParserErrorCollection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.ParserErrorCollection/VB/ParserErrorCollection_VB.aspx#3)]

The line number of the error source.

summary.span: 使用指定的错误文本、虚拟路径和错误源行号初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by using the specified error text, virtual path, and source line number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 构造函数初始化 具有自定义设置的对象。Use the constructor to initialize a object with custom settings. 构造函数具有以下属性：The constructor has the following properties: - 属性，它是包含与分析器错误相关的错误消息的字符串。The property, which is a string containing the error message that is related to the parser error. - 属性，它是一个只读字符串，指定包含分析器错误的文件的虚拟路径。The property, which is a read-only string that specifies the virtual path of the file that contains the parser error. - 属性，它是引发此对象的文件中的行号 。The property, which is the line number within the file at which this object was thrown.

span.span: A string containing the error message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 属性可为用于在对象中显示的分析器错误提供程序员定义的错误消息 。Use the property to provide a programmer-defined error message for parser errors for display in a object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何填充对象的 属性 。The following code example demonstrates how to populate the property for a object.
